message: I'd like to propose a fair deal to start. Let's split the money 95-5 in my favor. I believe this is a good starting point, and hopefully, we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm not willing to give you such a large share. I'm willing to give you a bit more than last round, but I still want to keep most of the money.

I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile. I'm proposing we split the money 60-40 in my favor. This is a fairer split than your previous offer and leaves room for future negotiation.
I'm still not willing to give you 60. I'll meet you halfway at 50-50, but I'm not going any higher than that.
